name: Pokedex
description:
This project was aimed at learning to use databases to fill data where required. I decided to make a fully interactable Pokedex using the Veekun database. Going 3D was partly due to having other 3D projects in the works where I was already learning Blender. This project was the first time I worked with 3D world space UI, so it was great to see the final product come to life very quickly through Unity's UI tools.

Install instructions

1. Download the .zip file of the game

2. Unzip the .zip file

3. Double click the Pokedex.exe to run it

4. Enjoy!
